ARya,\nSan Joseño!

Silong is a mobile Android-based app developed for the City Veterinary Office of San Jose del Monte City developed by BSIT students at Bulacan State University - Sarmiento Campus. This project aims to revolutionize the adoption process experience of the Office and its clients, and ultimately, save more lives one process at a time.

Owning a pet doesn\'t have to be costly! Through the Silong app, you may browse adoptable pets from the City Veterinary Office and begin the application process wherever you are. Just prepare the requirements, which can be seen on the Self Help page, and secure an appointment. You can save lives by adopting, rather than shopping.
